segments.text: I see the girl, standing there with her arm raised toward the cookie jar, her palm open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her anticipation is palpable; she truly believes she's about to receive a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I can't help but feel a mix of delight and concern for her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Does she even realize how close her brother is to falling off that stool?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she understands the consequences of their little heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This little act of rebellion is so innocent yet so risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It reminds me of how easily children can get swept up in the thrill of mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR
